page.title: 02Population and settlement
page.content: There are many farms,some of which date back more than 200 years.There are a number of large private houses & some smaller cottages(about haf a dozen).The A435 focuses most of the settlement in this area & it runs through the valley of the River Churn in the western part of the section.Otherwise the settlement is fairly scattered. The landscape is made up of mostly fields,some for grazing and some for crops.The landscape is not all at one height-the land is fairly hilly with many trees.
